title: I Wish You Were Here
lyrics:
I wish you were here
Everytime you disappear
I'm missing you're body let me make it clear
Everytime you disappear
I, I want you near I
I try to stay cool about it

Cause you always seem cool without it

Why do I try I I guess I want you to want me

But I say that I'm about it

I'm really not cool about it

Why don't you come on back cause I

I really want you to want me



You know you're all I think about,

Don't make me say it out loud

Cause all I think about is you



I wish you were here

(Oh I wish you were here)

Everytime you disappear

(Everytime you disappear)

I'm missing you're body let me make it clear

(Oh let me make it clear)

Everytime you disappear

I, I want you near I-

I wish you were here

(Oh I wish you were here)



Taking my t-shirt off

Making this whole world stop

Up on a table top

Making this kitchen rock

I try to stay cool about it

Cause you always seem cool without it

Why do I try I I guess I want you to want me



You know you're all I think about,

Don't make me say it out loud

Cause all I think about is you



I wish you were here

(Oh I wish you were here)

Everytime you disappear

(Everytime you disappear)

I'm missing you're body let me make it clear

(Oh let me make it clear)

Everytime you disappear

I, I want you near I

I wish you were here

(Oh I wish you were here)

I'm thinking about you let me make it clear

(Oh let me make it clear)

Everytime you disappear

I, I want you near I
